New Records: Luka Modric became the European Championship's oldest goalscorer
Key Match Events: Luka Modric scored a goal after missing a penalty
Mattia Zaccagni scored a last-minute equalizer for Italy
Post-Match Reflections: Luciano Spalletti had little time for expressions of negativity
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Leipzig Stadium
Others: The match was the last group stage match for both teams
